docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 28 (AP).--The National Administrative Council today asked Parliament for authorization to negotiate a loan of $17,000,000 with Hallgarten  Co. of New York.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, March 28 (AP).--The National Administrative Council today asked Parliament for authorization to negotiate a loan of $17,000,000 with Hallgarten Co. of New York.
docs.abstract: Parliament asked to authorize $17,000,000 loan from Hallgarten & Co for road construction

headline.main: URUGUAYAN LOAN PROPOSED; Parliament Asked to Authorize One for $17,000,000 Here.

headline.main: WILL HEAR HOOVER PHONE 3 PRESIDENTS; WABC Network Listeners to 'Eavesdrop' Thursday on First Line to Latin America. 8-HOUR SERVICE PLANNED 5,300-Mile Short-Wave Circuit, to Link Two Continents, Will Be Open From 9 A.M. to 5 P.M. Daily.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, April 1.--The execution of the Washington protocol for the settlement of the Chaco dispute between Bolivia and Paraguay is expected finally to get under way tomorrow.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, April 1.--The execution of the Washington protocol for the settlement of the Chaco dispute between Bolivia and Paraguay is expected finally to get under way tomorrow.
docs.abstract: Chaco peace plans in effect; negotiations reviewed

headline.main: CHACO PEACE PLANS TAKE EFFECT TODAY; Paraguay to Start to Rebuild Bolivian Fort Vanguardia as Uruguayans Supervise Task. RELATIONS TO BE RESUMED Principals Will Seek by Direct Negotiations a Final-Solution of Their Boundary Dispute. Five Neutrals Offered a Plan. Paraguay Finally Yielded.
